marketplaces.name: clojure-lsp-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Clojure Language Server Protocol support for Claude Code
marketplaces.repo_description: Clojure LSP plugin for Claude Code

files.README.md: # Clojure LSP Plugin for Claude Code Adds Clojure Language Server Protocol support to Claude Code. ## Prerequisites Install clojure-lsp: ```bash brew install clojure-lsp/brew/clojure-lsp-native ``` ## Installation ```bash # Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add Bigsy/claude-clojure-lsp # Install the plugin /plugin install clojure-lsp ``` Or via CLI: ```bash claude plugin marketplace add Bigsy/claude-clojure-lsp claude plugin install clojure-lsp ``` ## Supported File Extensions - `.clj` - Clojure - `.cljs` - ClojureScript - `.cljc` - Clojure Common - `.edn` - EDN - `.bb` - Babashka - `.cljd` - ClojureDart ## See it in action

plugins.name: clojure-lsp
plugins.description: Clojure Language Server Protocol support for Claude Code
